name: Anakin's Lightsaber (V)
Lore: 'Constructed by Anakin Skywalker. Kept by Obi-Wan Kenobi until given to Luke.',
Text: 'Deploy on Leia, non-Jedi Luke, or any Mara. May add 1 to Force drain where present. May target a character or creature. Draw two destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value. Instead of firing, may use 1 Force to cancel a just drawn weapon destiny here.(Original concept by Peter Nordstrom - Alderaan Regional 2005)',
